product_details.name: Essentials membership plan
product_details.app_short_description: Up to 50% off bestsellers with pay-over-time plans that work for you.
product_details.app_long_description: Buy now, pay later. Select a plan that meets your needs with low payments spread over time so you can enjoy products now without the up-front cost. And it's automated — we worry about renewals, refills, and billing, so you don't have to.

product_details.name: Sonic Toothbrush - Black
product_details.app_short_description: The brush that started it all. Our first iconic sonic, made with pros
product_details.app_long_description: The sonic brush that rocked the dental world. Three modes, super soft bristles, 4-week battery life, and clinically proven to remove up to 10x more plaque and reduce gingivitis up to 3x more than a manual for healthier gums* with less effort.
product_details.special_subscription_label: $7.00 replacement head/ $14.99 Whitening Strips sent every 12 weeks, cancel anytime.

product_details.name: Travel Case - Black
product_details.app_short_description: Take your sonic vibes on the road with a durable matching travel case.
product_details.app_long_description: Stylish, convenient, and protective, our travel case is the ultimate oral care accessory for those on the move. A perfect fit for your brush and brush head! With a magnetic closure and durable, slim body. Made for the Original brush only.

product_details.name: Water Flosser - Black
product_details.app_short_description: Precisely spray between your teeth to dislodge food and bad bacteria.
product_details.app_long_description: When string isn't your thing — use up to 160 PSI of plaque-blasting water power instead. Stimulate gums and refresh the mouth with our easy-to-maneuver, rotating tipped flosser. With three tip options, three handy modes, and a cordless design.
product_details.special_subscription_label: $6.00 replacement tip every 24 weeks & $14.99 Whitening Strips sent every 12 weeks, cancel anytime.

product_details.app_short_description: Non-chalky with a potent concentration of BLIS K12 and BLIS M-18.

product_details.app_long_description: Created to give kids the best brushing experience and offered in several fun colors and exclusive CoComelon designs! Easy for children to use, ultra-grippy soft silicone, handy timer, 4-week battery life between charges, and much more.
